amendment.description: To increase funding to fully fund the Clean Coal Power Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3123 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3123 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S2250-2251; text: CR S2250) To increase funding to fully fund the Clean Coal Power Initiative.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3123 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3123 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Coleman.
